section.p: ‘Did you pass on my letter to Baroness Ravayne?’ asks Kiyomori with a frown. ‘I cannot understand why she has not shown any interest in marrying my son.’
It is hardly a mystery to you. Young Lord Shigemori is a fat waddling fellow with personal habits that would do no credit to a hyena. You don’t mention this to Kiyomori. .
